title: Critical Instructional Design Inquiry: Methods for Designing Creative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning theories and understanding of instructional design processes
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design competencies for language learning contexts through participatory/collaborative design in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Students can analyze three or more instructional design frameworks for language learning using participatory design processes.
Through collaborative workshop activities, learners can develop at least one draft of a learner-tailored instructional design plan.
Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of existing instructional design models using critical design thinking, identifying at least five aspects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
